name: dragband
author: S. Derdeyn <sigged@users.noreply.github.com>
description: Creates a draggable band from a list. Supports swiping.

scripts.build:css: npm run build:sass && npm run build:postcss
scripts.build:postcss: trash build/css/*.min.css && postcss build/css/*.css -d build/css/ --ext min.css --config postcss.config.js
scripts.build:js: babel src/assets/scripts/ --out-dir build/scripts && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --comments -o build/scripts/dragband.min.js -- build/scripts/dragband.js
